Text:
Wow, 4 and a half gigs for a half hour show?! How'd you get the filesize so fucking small for a TV episode?

But really, past a gig or two it's fucking pointless because there is no way this aired in 3400x2800 resolution HD. Come on now, use your brain. This is not necessary.

@RyanGee92
You may want to try googling what a Transport Stream is as well before coming to conclusions.
lol, never mind the braindeads, THANK YOUUUU for uploading all of my favorite shows every week :3
